ygData.subject: Re: mistake
ygData.msgSnippet: Just move in any direction.  forward, back, sidestep to the left, sidestep to the right. Turning won t disrupt the spell, but if you move it will be disrupted.
ygData.messageBody:
Just move in any direction. forward, back, sidestep to the left, sidestep
to the right. Turning won't disrupt the spell, but if you move it will be
disrupted.

----- Original Message -----
From: Ideoit <ideoit@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 9:50 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] mistake


> From: Ideoit <ideoit@...>
>
> say I ran into a problem last night that is a bit embarrasing. I was
> ...actually i dont know where i was :P I druid teleported me somewhere i
> just followed for the hell of it. anyway i was fighting some lowly skel
> that decided to pester us on r way to i think mino caves? anyway i went
> to cast fire bolt on it and i acidently hit my gate spell AAK!! I
> tried hittimg esc but it didnt work. Do ANY of u know how to stop a
> spell from being cast if u want to.
> -id
